ai-tha-ap210:1.3_0: along the way of taking the path,
ai-tha-ap210:1.4_0: such a one, the great hermit,
ai-tha-ap210:2.1_0: Seeing her slave, full of flowers,
ai-tha-ap210:2.2_0: I’ve plucked the root of all,
ai-tha-ap210:2.3_0: My mind is serene with a thought
ai-tha-ap210:3.2_0: As a bird was worshipped by the flowers,
ai-tha-ap210:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap210:4.2_0: one free of greed, hate and delusion,
ai-tha-ap210:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Kosiya.
